title: RAJ & GRIZ - SATURNDAY SOCIAL - 20230311
description:
Virtually Not Alone Network Saturnday Social Event

@RajDosanjh joins @GrimGriz in discussion of Defense Against the Dark Arts, Paintball Crucifiction & "Those Kids These Days" - with highlighted chat from the HiveMind.

ANACHINO23 FUND:
https://givesendgo.com/anachino23?utm_source=sharelink&utm_medium=copy_link&utm_campaign=anachino23

ESTUARY CHINO & PB4J Tickets
https://events.eventzilla.net/e/estuary-chino-2023-2138601197

LINDER'S LODGING LEAGUE
https://forms.gle/Db7ky6AuYx4xScpR8

Shadow Cabal Energy Transfer:  
https://donate.stripe.com/fZebJuciu1xe1P2fYY

Shadow Cabal Goose Hoodie:
 https://www.etsy.com/au/listing/1340501337/there-is-no-agency-unisex-zipper-hoodie

Howdy Rascal Baseball Tee:
https://www.etsy.com/au/listing/1401078187/howdy-rascal-raglan-baseball-tee-34

Goose & Rascal Artistry:
https://mudhutillustration.com/shop/

The Broken Cl0ck Tower Discord:  https://discord.gg/Sm7b8kNjXN
(A discord for people who don't hate me)

https://grimgriz.substack.com/
here too:
https://grimgriz.medium.com/
